title.native: 乙女ゲームの破滅フラグしかない悪役令嬢に転生してしまった…Ｘ
title.romaji: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta… X
title.english: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! X

description:
The second season of Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta….

Katarina Claes, the daughter of a duke, regains her memories from a previous life after hitting her head on a rock. The world she lives in now is the world of Fortune Lover, the otome game she was hooked on in her previous life, and she is now the villainess who interferes with the heroine's love story! The happy ending prepared for Katarina in the game is being exiled from the country, and the bad ending, she gets killed... but she's determined to avoid all destruction flags and claim a happy future for herself! And after she succeeds in avoiding those flags, a new crisis awaits?! The curtain rises once again on this flirtatious romantic comedy!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: เกิดใหม่เป็นนางร้ายจะเลือกทางไหนก็หายนะ X
เกิดใหม่เป็นนางร้ายจะเลือกทางไหนก็หายนะ ภาค 2

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Agriculture
tags.description: Prominently features agriculture practices.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

node.description:
Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/629551696)

Affiliated with EXPLOSION.

Has a twin brother named [Naoki Etou](https://anilist.co/staff/146123) in the animation industry.

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/miki-sakurai)

Miki Sakurai was born in 1991 in Miyagi Prefecture. Graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts. She studied composition with Tatsuhiko Nishioka, Yoshihiko Katori, and electronic acoustic music with Takenobu Mori. While studying at university, she began to play Irish music and produce music for art animation. Currently active in various fields, including theater.

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.
angela is a Japanese pop band. The main members are Yamashita Atsuko (artist name "atsuko") and Hirasato Katsunori (artist name "KATSU").
